add_or_update_contact.description: Add or update a single contact

props.name: contact
props.description: Enter the contact properties, the User ID is mandatory

props.name: instant
props.description: Process contact immediately instead of queuing. Only enable this when you need to add an event for this contact in the next step. Not recommended for high-volume operations.

props.name: event_id
props.description: Unique identifier for this event. Used for deduplication.

props.name: event_date
props.description: Date and time when the event occurred, will default to now (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.SSSZ)

props.name: event_type
props.description: Select the type of event to create

props.name: event_parameters
props.description: Parameters for the selected event type

delete_contact.description: Delete a single contact by User ID

props.name: userId
props.description: Unique identifier of the contact to delete
